catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Hours to be arranged. Nicholas Watson and members of the Department Two terms required of all thesis honors seniors. To enroll, students must submit for approval a Thesis Proposal.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Satisfactory completion of one term of English 98r, completion of an undergraduate seminar (90-level) taken in the junior year or earlier, and faculty approval of proposed thesis topic.
catalog_info.description: Supervised individual tutorial in an independent scholarly or critical subject.
